author: wddgit
body:
#### PR description:

The most significant part of this involves replicating
the PayloadProxy object so there is one per IOV and
moving the IOVProxy object out of PayloadProxy into
DataProxyWrapper so there can only be one of those
per record type. When each new IOV actually becomes
active the IOV range gets copied into the PayloadProxy.

Except for a few tests, the number of concurrent IOVs
will still be configured to be 1 everywhere so nothing
will run with concurrent IOVs even after this PR is
merged. I would suggest additional testing and validation
be done before concurrent IOVs are used in production.
And also some thought will be necessary to determine
where the performance gain justifies the extra memory used
by the concurrent IOVs.

#### PR validation:

A new unit test is added that runs CondDBESSource with
multiple IOVs being processed concurrently, reads data
from the database into BeamSpot objects, and compares
that data with a reference file to verify the values
read remain the same.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

Not a backport and should not be backported.
title: Upgrade CondDBESSource to support concurrent IOVs
